Reviews.Title: “dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: EdinburghTimbergirl
Reviews.Content: stayed febuary weather coldwe booked website promote hotel offering free drinks lounge stayed hotel couple ago offered inclusive price venere dates jumped dissapointment arrivedthe hotel offer inclusive buy wasnt happy didnt purchase breakfast overpriced hotel quiet 20 min tam ride dam buy travel isnt night travel citythe clean beds player roomnice staffnot happy looking friendlyi wont staying email venere complain answer actually trips weve amazing citybut cost lot originaly visit june

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, comfortable hotel close to RAI Exhibition center”
Reviews.Author: Flatulus
Reviews.Content: savoy hotel close rai exhibition center comfortable 10 minutes walk free wifi hotel plentiful breakfast comfortable beds staff helpful efficient checkin parking close hotel center amsterdam easily reached tram pity bar quiet drink

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay At The Savoy Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Iceman_1983
Reviews.Content: please start saying hotel rated trip advisor stayed hotel 24th december 2011 till 28th december 2011 wife amazing stay leaving amsterdam spent 100 hours reading reviews looking sites hotels worried ratings stay definitely hotel rating 70 below price 15 mins drive airport shuttle 50 euros return trip 2 hotel paid euro including breakfast decent compared 15 eurosperson rest hotels charge city tax 5 tram 25 12 takes dam square tram station stone throw hotel nice peaceful police station reception amazingly helpful friendly spacious beds comfortable lots eat inlcuding indonesian thai etc experience albert market 2 stops tram van museum 2 mins tram smoking hotel smell weed hallway smoker definitely mind overall nice hotel price pay recommend amsterdam dont wold price hotel charges ps stay advise am amsterdam duration suits trams lot free entry lot museums free canal cruise

Reviews.Title: “Good value”

Reviews.Content: slept hotel amsterdam visiting friends front desk lady polite helpful clean quiet comfortable price competetive amsterdam luxury hotel stretch job location central local fun pleasant easy tram connections town
